name: A good story in a nutshell
name_original: A good story in a nutshell
description: This is a game that has an amazing story to go through. However, the story, is in a nutshell. Make sure you grab items that look like part of the background, and the controls are like a normal RPG Maker MV's controls, move with arrow keys, Z and X for action and menu screen, and shift to run.
